subject: Dakar Rally
Sports Injuries
Murders, Attempted Murders and Homicides
Traffic Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: A Bolivian spectator was killed at the Dakar Rally when he was hit by a car driven by the Frenchman Lionel Baud during the seventh stage, from Bolivia to Argentina, the event organizers said.
snippet: A Bolivian spectator was killed at the Dakar Rally when he was hit by a car driven by the Frenchman Lionel Baud during the seventh stage, from Bolivia to Argentina, the event organizers said.
